text: Odd "Ivers" Iversen (6 November 1945 â€“ 29 December 2014) was a Norwegian footballer. He was known for his former record of 158 goals in Norwegian top tier football, as well as his still-standing record of 30 goals in a single season. Iversen died in Trondheim in the early hours of 29 December 2014 from an unknown illness, aged 69./ He was the father of Steffen Iversen. ==Honours== Rosenborg *Norwegian top division: 1967, 1969 Individual *Norwegian top division top scorer: 1967, 1968, 1969, 1979 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Norway Category:Norwegian footballers Category:People from Trondheim
title: Odd Iversen
